Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to methods for cancelling contracts
Summary: Requires that a business allow a consumer to cancel a contract between the two parties using the same method that was used to enter into the contract.
LawCode: Add ยง391-x, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to methods for cancelling contracts
